response.summary:
PROFILE
Passionate fifth year mechatronic engineering student with experience in developing engineering solutions that involve multiple knowledge areas as mechanics, electronics, programming, control and manufacturing in cross-functional team environments, commited with excellence and a constant pursuit for innovation.

RELEVANT COLLEGE COURSEWORK

•	Design and construction of Mobile Minning Robot, for NASA Mining robot competition.
Design mechanical, electrical, and software for the locomotion system of the robot based on the competition rules and restrictions, developing the team leader role.
•	Develop 2 DOF serial robot. July – Dec 2014
Based on performance requirements, design and build mechanical structure, select electronic components, design and program control structure.
Major achievements:
Implemented Feedforward and feedback complementary control architecture, which leaded to high performance motion control.
1st  Place Award – Expoideas 2014-II Universidad Nacional de Colombia &  CCB (Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá) –  Category: Mechanic and Electronic Projects- Spark Ideas. 
Press Release:
RENATA (Academic high technology national association) and Agencia de Noticias UNAL (National University of Colombia News Agency)– “Robot draws perfect trajectories on vertical planes”
•	Design and construction of NACA 4412 wing for pressure profile tests on wind tunnel.
•	Mechanical Design Delta 2DOF Robot January – June 2014
Design mechanical structure with static and dynamic FEA (Finite Element Analysis).
•	Design fast fixture multimachine device. January – June 2014
Design fast fixturing pneumatic device usable in a CMM, a Multiaxis Mill, a JinnFA 32 Swiss Lathe and a Leadwell V20 Machining center, with piece presence detection, and adaptable to different piece geometries.
•	Develop Micromouse. January – June 2014
Design and build mechanical structure, selection of electronic components and program control algorithms on a freescale 8-bit microprocessor.
response.skills: Ingeniería mecatrónica, Lean manufacturing, Robótica, Soldadura, Electrónica, Programación, Diseño de productos mecánicos, Método de los elementos finitos, Automatización industrial, Automatización de procesos, Fotografía, Diseño asistido por ordenador, Microcontroladores, Diseño de sistemas de control, Sensores

profile_positions.description: MPD leader for Making & packing Operations
profile_positions.title: Process Designer

profile_positions.description: Fundador de empresa de Fotografía y video aéreo con multirotores.
profile_positions.title: Fundador y Piloto

company.name: Procter & Gamble
company.description:
P&G was founded more than 185 years ago as a soap and candle company. Today, we’re one of the world’s largest consumer goods companies and home to iconic, trusted brands, including Always®, Charmin®, Braun®, Fairy®, Febreze®, Gillette®, Head & Shoulders®, Oral B®, Pantene®, Pampers®, Tide®, and Vicks®. 
 
The design, development, growth and success of these products—and many more—is thanks to the innovative and insightful minds of our people. From Day 1, you’ll help make everyday life easier for our 5 billion consumers. 
 
There is no single equation for success at P&G, because no two P&G people or careers are alike. Just as we strive to deliver a superior consumer experience, we aim to deliver a superior employee value equation as well. With our large global footprint, there are many opportunities to work with P&G in multiple locations. We offer opportunities in approximately 70 countries and continually aim to attract, reward and advance the finest people in the world. 
 
Here, we want you to get your career off to a fast start. That's why we don't have any rotational development programs or gradual ramping-up periods: you’ll be able—and encouraged—to dive right in from Day 1. Join us and help make life better through meaningful work that makes an impact from Day 1.
